__TOC__

Mark Shuttleworth (aka sabdfl) has been visiting '''Warsaw, Poland''' and met with members of the Ubuntu Community.  

'''When''' : 7pm, Monday 12 June <<BR>>
'''Where''' :  Seminar Hall, <nowiki>[[http://www.iimcb.gov.pl/|The International Institute of Molecular and Cell Biology in Warsaw]]</nowiki>. Ochota Campus Near to the city center and on the road to Warszawa Okecie airport. <nowiki>[[http://marcin.genesilico.pl/maps.html|See details on the Google Maps]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[http://www.iimcb.gov.pl/ochota_campus.php|map of the campus]]</nowiki>. How to get from <nowiki>[[http://www.iimcb.gov.pl/how_to_get_from_airport.php|the airport]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[http://www.iimcb.gov.pl/how_to_get_from_railway.php|Central Railroad Station]]</nowiki>. 
Hosts: <nowiki>[[http://marcin.genesilico.pl/genesilico.jpg|Laboratory of Bioinformatics and Protein Engineering Team ]]</nowiki>. Contact: Marcin Feder, marcin genesilico pl , mobile: 694 438 500.<<BR>>
'''Who''' : All members of the Ubuntu community <<BR>>

=== Proposition of place ===
* <nowiki>[[http://eo.pl|eo Networks Sp. z o.o. HQ]]</nowiki> - new office (Olbrachta), 170m2 "open space" room, video projector
* <nowiki>[[http://nowoczesnapolska.org.pl|Fundacja Nowoczesna Polska]]</nowiki> good localisation on corner of Marszalkowska St. and Al. Jerozolimskie, conference room for 20 ppl, overall capacity up to 40 people, avalaible all day
* Seminar Hall in <nowiki>[[http://www.iimcb.gov.pl/|The International Institute of Molecular and Cell Biology in Warsaw]]</nowiki> . 60 chairs, video projector, microphone etc (<nowiki>[[ftp://ftp.genesilico.pl/marcin/front.jpg|front]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[ftp://ftp.genesilico.pl/marcin/back.jpg|back]]</nowiki> view)  . The Institute is located on the Ochota Campus, near to the city center and on the road to Warszawa Okecie airport. <nowiki>[[http://marcin.genesilico.pl/maps.html|See details on the Google Maps]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[http://www.iimcb.gov.pl/ochota_campus.php|map of the campus]]</nowiki>. How to get from <nowiki>[[http://www.iimcb.gov.pl/how_to_get_from_airport.php|the airport]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[http://www.iimcb.gov.pl/how_to_get_from_railway.php|Central Railroad Station]]</nowiki>. 
 We have booked the hall for the Monday evening. Hosts: <nowiki>[[http://marcin.genesilico.pl/genesilico.jpg|Laboratory of Bioinformatics and Protein Engineering Team ]]</nowiki> Contact marcin genesilico pl .

==== How you can help? ====

If you have suggestions for an appropriate venue, or if your company can host the meeting, or if you know the best pub to meet up at, please let us know!  You can make suggestions below or email chris.kenyon@canonical.com.
